text: Funk Volume was an independent record label and production company. It produced hip hop music. It was founded in 2009 by rapper Hopsin and Damien "Dame" Ritter. So far, Funk Volume has signed artists such as Dizzy Wright, Jarren and Hopsin. They have released 2 albums under Funk Volume. Funk Volume began in 2009 after Hopsin left Ruthless Records. Before he launched it, he made a mixtape to promote the label. ==References== Category:2009 establishments in California Category:Companies based in Los Angeles Category:Independent record labels
title: Funk Volume
